articles.author: Patrick Wintour, Lisa O'Carroll
articles.title: US urges no more 'flare ups' from UK over Northern Ireland - The Guardian
articles.description: European unity ‘is our north star’ says Department of State official, as protocol standoff appears to ease
articles.content:
A senior adviser in the Biden administration has urged the UK not to cause more flare ups over Northern Ireland as Brexit talks reopen in London.
In an unusually blunt intervention for a policy advi… [+3811 chars]

articles.title: COVID wave looms in Europe as booster campaign makes slow start - Reuters
articles.description: A new COVID-19 wave appears to be brewing in Europe as cooler weather arrives, with public health experts warning that vaccine fatigue and confusion over types of available vaccines will likely limit booster uptake.
articles.content: Oct 6 (Reuters) - A new COVID-19 wave appears to be brewing in Europe as cooler weather arrives, with public health experts warning that vaccine fatigue and confusion over types of available vaccines… [+4129 chars]

articles.title: Even Macron has realised that the EU can't claim to speak for Europe - The Telegraph
articles.description: His new European club is a chance for a fresh start – and Britain should aim to stay at the heart of it
articles.content: At first, Liz Truss dismissed Emmanuel Macrons plan for a new club of European nations. There are already too many such talking shops, she said: why not make them work better? But Tim Barrow, the new… [+5954 chars]
